txt.en: Talk to Bósi near the entrance to Clovengap
Follow the dwarves into Clovengap
Examine the warg corpse
Talk to Bori by the warg corpse in Clovengap
Bósi stands by the entrance to Clovengap.
DNT - Blah!
'Another corpse!'
Bori and the other dwarves gather around the warg corpse you found near the entrance to Clovengap.
'Ware the fog, friends!'
'Onward into Clovengap!'
'Remain alert, [placeholder]. None of us must be blinded by the beauty of Akrakír, for we are here to learn where the Angmarim have stolen the Black Stone Anvil of my people!'
'Well, that's good news.'
'What is that?'
You and the dwarves have followed the trail of the Angmarim into Clovengap, where you hope you will find some sign of the Black Stone Anvil's passage.
The dwarves have discovered the corpse of an Angmarim cultist not far from the first body you encountered in Clovengap.
'We should try not to attract their attention.'
'Something lies on the turf there.'
The dwarves discuss the violence that has been done here in Clovengap; what does it mean for the safety of your travelling party?
'I am not afraid, father!'
'Very well, but remain alert!'

'This warg was not slain by dwarf-axes or swords, then? Aye, I see the scorch marks. Fire it was that killed this beast.'

He faces Bósi and raises his voice.

'I will lead us from here, father! Follow me!'
There are wolf-voices on the wind, and it seems the dwarves do not have long to prepare before the wargs attack!
'We can slay three wargs!'
'An enemy of the wargs may not be an enemy of ours... but it might!'
'Look there! Up ahead.'
'It means our foes are not as united as they believe themselves to be.'
'This must be warg territory.'
This corpse has been torn by the sharp claws of wargs
'The Angmarim brought the Black Stone Anvil into Clovengap, and the wargs attacked them.'

'You too, [placeholder]. Wargs are as smart as they are ferocious, and I expect this hunting-pack to attempt to encircle us.\n\n'They may attack from any direction, and we must be prepared to defend ourselves!'
Follow the dwarves into Clovengap
You have fended off the wargs... for now.

'We should make camp before another warg-pack finds us. They will not have forgotten the death of Ránulur upon the very threshold of the Mountain-home. That was the doing of dwarves, but it was Gorgar that commanded the warg-chieftain to battle. Until we have a better foothold in Gundabad, this is their territory... not ours.\n\n'But one day it will be ours again.'
Fight alongside the dwarves in Clovengap. <rgb=#FF0000>Bósi must not be defeated!</rgb>
'Remain alert, [placeholder]. None of us must be blinded by the beauty of Akrakír, for we are here to learn where the Angmarim have stolen the Black Stone Anvil of our people!'
The dwarves have discovered the corpse of a warg among the mist-laden grasses of Clovengap.
The corpse of this warg is marked by fire, and smells of sorcery
Bósi has been defeated!
Examine the corpse of the Angmarim cultist
Listen to the dwarves discuss the situation in Clovengap
Talk to Bósi in Clovengap
'Aye.'
'Hey!'
'Everyone draw close. Form a circle, back to back.'
'Did you hear that?'
'Race you to the arch, Bróin!'
You hear a distant howling carried on the breeze
'Steady... steady...'
'I hear our footsteps on the earth and in the grass... but I think that is all.'
'What does it mean?'
Remain alert for the return of the wargs
The howling of the wargs is much closer
'Is that the last of them?'
'Okay, Bróin. That time I heard it.'
'Some of the cultists must have survived, for the Black Block is not here.'
The wargs are now very close!
'Here they come!'
'Is it not too late for that, Bori? The Angmarim have already kicked the hive!'
'Welcome to Clovengap!'
'Bori, listen!'
'There are never just three wargs!'
'There is only one thing to say.'
'Is everyone all right?'
Instance: Assault on Clovengap
